title: How the Light Gets In
description: This time I'm crying because I can't have what I want, when the whole point of my being here is to get everything I want.Meet Lou Conner - twisted teen with a difference. Gifted, miserable and desperate to escape her life of poverty in Sydney, when she is offered an exchange student placement in America it seems as if all her dreams will be fulfilled...From hopeful beginning to unexpected, haunting end, Lou Conner will pull you into her story and keep you there.
author: M.J. Hyland
